Html:
Hello together,

i am developing an application and want to use the OpenStreetMap as Standard map. Until 2 weeks it won't work and i receive the error message "Der Remoteserver hat einen Fehler zurückgegeben: (403) unzulässig".

The same results by using the gMap.net Demo Application. What can i do?

Hi,

Working fine with me, try the fix from this post: http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/657502
